Texts.Chs: 当涉及到移民控制时，一些政府官员似乎完全没有注意到史莱姆们的存在。免疫：黏液减速、中毒和感电，^reset;^orange;抵抗：火炎，^reset;^red;，弱点：寒气^reset;
Texts.Eng: When it comes to control of migration, certain government officials just don't seem to see slimes. ^green;HP regen, immune: slime slow, poison, electricity,^reset; ^orange;resist: fire,^reset; ^red;weak: ice^reset;
